text: Tomara satkaja karale satkaja nijedera jan'ya karabe ebam mandakaja karale ta'o karabe nijedera jan'ya. Tarapara parabarti nirdharita samaya upasthita hale (ami amara bandadera pathalama) tomadera mukhamandala kalimacchanna karara jan'ya, prathamabara tara yebhabe masajide prabesa karechila abara sebhabe'i tate prabesa karara jan'ya ebam tara ya adhikara karechilo ta sampurnabhabe dhbansa karara jan'ya
